attributes.action: Stop foreign aid charity begins at home
attributes.additional_details: We are in the middle of a cost of living crisis yet the government gives tax payers money to countries that don’t need it
attributes.background: Stop foreign aid and use this money in our country to help the UK PEOPLE

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Abolish Foreign Aid and use the savings to reduce energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623154

Halt overseas aid completely until the poverty in the UK is eradicated: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622451
